title: The Battle for Bowen Hills
creator_credit: Garry Lane, Peter Gray and Crowsfoot Films
brief_description: The story of Brisbane working class residents’ protracted struggle to defend their homes against the inner city freeway proposals of the Queensland Government. This film was made for community groups under a similar threat and for those interested in multinational development and the political economy of transport. Narrated by Geraldine Willisee. (Also includes ex-Queensland Senator Russ Hinze).
